item.title: Creating This Site
item.description: This will become the first blog on this new site. Goals: use Asciidoc host at: jshingler.github.io make publishing as easy as possbile and looking great Hugo Asciidoctor Mention Drew Heintz callout on Hugo There are things to note! jim.groovy package com.mrhaki import static ratpack.groovy.Groovy.ratpack ratpack { handlers { get { render "
